email 1:
Hi Stephen, Dropping in with something that might be useful (or at least mildly interesting.)



I’m Trent. I run Toon Theory, it’s just a few of us drawing stories for people like you who don’t love PowerPoints.



I know SF Tax and Advisory Services delivers bundled services that aren’t easy to summarize in one email or pitch deck. Even smart prospects can tune out if things aren’t quite framed right. These videos fix that. Our explainers do that job in under two minutes, with zero input needed on your end.



Most teams keep reusing them; on websites, in follow-ups, or even onboarding flows.



Let me know if you want a quick visual mock; no deck, no pitch, just a sketch.



If you're curious at all, feel free to reply. There’s some previous work listed in my signature. And if this isn’t for you, just reply 'NO'.



All the best,
Trent — Founder, Toon Theory
www.toontheory.com
Trusted by consultants, coaches, and businesses who care about clarity.
